segments.text: This is ridiculous – the sink is overflowing and no one cares.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, fussing over one stupid plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring out, making a mess on the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in it, and she doesn't even notice – how clueless!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those bratty kids are climbing everywhere, risking a big fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting; that boy could crash and break something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're stealing cookies like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, begging for her share of the theft.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet left on, drain clogged – total negligence in this house.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is neat, but inside it's a sloppy disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to teach these kids about rules and safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm fuming just watching this careless chaos unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn off the water already; it's infuriating!
segments.speaker: PAR
